sentences.cn: ...历史上最臭名昭著的恶行之一。

sentences.en: a day that will live in infamy
And over her grave, the infamy that she must carry thither would be her only monument.
sentences.cn: 而她必将带到坟墓中去的那个耻辱,将是矗立在她坟上的唯一墓碑.

sentences.en: From fame to infamy is a much travelled road.
sentences.cn: 从名誉到耻辱是很多人走过的路.

sentences.en: He burned with shame as he stared at the vision of his infamy.
sentences.cn: 他眼睁睁地望着这幕自己出丑的场景,羞愧得脸上热辣辣的.

sentences.en: His name will live in infamy , ie He will always be held in disgrace.
sentences.cn: 他的名字将与耻辱共存.

sentences.en: His name will live in infamy.
I reeled back, overcome with the infamy of it.
sentences.cn: 151这种背信弃义的丑事把我气得倒退了好几步.

sentences.en: Infamy was babbling around her in the public market - place.
sentences.cn: 在公共市场上,她周围泛滥着对她丑行的种种议论.

sentences.en: It is better to die with honor than to live in infamy.
sentences.cn: 宁可死于名誉中,也不要活在声名狼藉下.

sentences.en: Pride breakfasted with plenty , dined with poverty , and supped with infamy.
sentences.cn: 骄者往往早餐丰盛, 午餐寒酸, 晚餐声名狼藉.

sentences.en: Pride breakfasted with plenty , dined with Poverty , and supped with Infamy.
sentences.cn: 骄傲起于成功,继之挫折, 终至身败名裂.

sentences.en: Would you bring infamy on your sacred profession? "
sentences.cn: 你愿意给你神圣的职业蒙受耻辱 吗 ? ”

sentences.en: Yesterday, December 7 th 1941, a date which will live infamy.
sentences.cn: 昨天, 1941年12月7日, 将永远成为我们的耻辱日.
